headline: Zentra Brings Resident Key in Google Wallet to Customers
summary: Zentra, a brand of Allegion US, and leading provider of smart access solutions, is the first to offer resident key capability in Google Wallet™. This enables residents to easily and securely add their resident key to Google Wallet and unlock their apartment with a simple tap of their Android™ phone or Wear OS by Google smartwatch. With this new capability, residents can unlock their building doors, amenity spaces and individual apartment units without contact using their Android Phone or Wear OS
